headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  AIELLO, DOMINICK J

docs.snippet: AIELLO--Dominick J. August 31, 2014. Beloved husband of the late Mary. Devoted father of Vincent, Rosann, Dominick and the late Raymond. Dear grandfather of Riccardo, Serena, Daniel and Jon-Michael. Great-grandfather of Yusuf, Gianna Rose, Miriam,...
docs.lead_paragraph: AIELLO--Dominick J. August 31, 2014. Beloved husband of the late Mary. Devoted father of Vincent, Rosann, Dominick and the late Raymond. Dear grandfather of Riccardo, Serena, Daniel and Jon-Michael. Great-grandfather of Yusuf, Gianna Rose, Miriam, Henry and Francesca. Loving Brother of Anthony, Peter, Orlando and Susan. Reposing at Perazzo Funeral Home, 199 Bleecker Street, New York City, Mass of Christian Burial Thursday 10:30am, St. Anthony's Church. Entombment Trinity Church Mausoleum. Friends may call Wednesday 2-5pm and 7-9pm. In lieu of flowers, donations to the Prostate Cancer Foundation, www.pcf.org, would be appreciated. For online condolences please visit us at: perazzofuneralhome.com

headline.print_headline: Flowers' 2 Homers Lift White Sox Over Twins
headline.main: Flowers' 2 Homers Lift White Sox Over Twins

docs.snippet: Tyler Flowers' first career multi-homer game lifted the Chicago White Sox to a 6-3 win over the Minnesota Twins in 10 innings on Tuesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tyler Flowers' first career multi-homer game lifted the Chicago White Sox to a 6-3 win over the Minnesota Twins in 10 innings on Tuesday night.

headline.print_headline: Democrat, Independent Join Forces to Unseat Alaska Governor
headline.main: Democrat, Independent Join Forces to Unseat Alaska Governor

docs.snippet: Alaska's Democratic and independent candidates for governor have decided to team up as running mates in the upcoming November election in a rare deal aimed at defeating the conservative state's Republican incumbent....
docs.lead_paragraph: Alaska's Democratic and independent candidates for governor have decided to team up as running mates in the upcoming November election in a rare deal aimed at defeating the conservative state's Republican incumbent.

headline.print_headline: India's Bright GDP Just a Small Step in Long Road to Sustained Revival
headline.main: India's Bright GDP Just a Small Step in Long Road to Sustained Revival

docs.snippet: Optimism that sunny growth figures herald an economic revival in India is probably misplaced - in fact there is little hard evidence to support the idea that Asia's third-largest economy is heading for a broader and sustained rebound anytime soon....
docs.lead_paragraph: Optimism that sunny growth figures herald an economic revival in India is probably misplaced - in fact there is little hard evidence to support the idea that Asia's third-largest economy is heading for a broader and sustained rebound anytime soon.

headline.print_headline: Speeding Truck Overturns, Kills 10 in India
headline.main: Speeding Truck Overturns, Kills 10 in India

docs.snippet: Police say a speeding truck has overturned and crushed to death 10 people, including seven children, sleeping on a sidewalk in northern India....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police say a speeding truck has overturned and crushed to death 10 people, including seven children, sleeping on a sidewalk in northern India.

headline.print_headline: Australia to Sign Uranium Trade Deal With India
headline.main: Australia to Sign Uranium Trade Deal With India

docs.snippet: Australia's prime minister said Wednesday that he will sign a uranium export deal with India for peaceful power generation this week, but added that exports of the nuclear fuel to Russia have been banned until further notice....
docs.lead_paragraph: Australia's prime minister said Wednesday that he will sign a uranium export deal with India for peaceful power generation this week, but added that exports of the nuclear fuel to Russia have been banned until further notice.

headline.print_headline: Arrieta, Cubs Send Brewers to 7th Straight Loss
headline.main: Arrieta, Cubs Send Brewers to 7th Straight Loss

docs.snippet: Jake Arrieta pitched six solid innings and the Chicago Cubs handed the Milwaukee Brewers their seventh straight loss, 7-1 Tuesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jake Arrieta pitched six solid innings and the Chicago Cubs handed the Milwaukee Brewers their seventh straight loss, 7-1 Tuesday night.

headline.print_headline: Astros Win Again Behind Peacock and Altuve
headline.main: Astros Win Again Behind Peacock and Altuve

docs.snippet: Jose Altuve had four hits for the second straight night, Brad Peacock threw 6 1-3 solid innings and the Houston Astros beat the Los Angeles Angels 8-3 on Tuesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jose Altuve had four hits for the second straight night, Brad Peacock threw 6 1-3 solid innings and the Houston Astros beat the Los Angeles Angels 8-3 on Tuesday night.

headline.print_headline: Australia RBA Wary of Stoking House Prices With Lower Rates
headline.main: Australia RBA Wary of Stoking House Prices With Lower Rates

docs.snippet: Australia's top central banker on Wednesday signalled further cuts in interest rates were unlikely as it would be "unwise" to risk further inflating already high house prices....
docs.lead_paragraph: Australia's top central banker on Wednesday signalled further cuts in interest rates were unlikely as it would be "unwise" to risk further inflating already high house prices.

headline.print_headline: Crew of Doomed South Korea Ferry Drank Beer While Awaiting Rescue: Media
headline.main: Crew of Doomed South Korea Ferry Drank Beer While Awaiting Rescue: Media

docs.snippet: Some crew of a ferry that capsized in April in South Korea's worst maritime disaster in 44 years drank beer while waiting for rescue, one of them told a court, in an admission likely to fuel anger at their conduct during the final moments of the m...
docs.lead_paragraph: Some crew of a ferry that capsized in April in South Korea's worst maritime disaster in 44 years drank beer while waiting for rescue, one of them told a court, in an admission likely to fuel anger at their conduct during the final moments of the mishap.
